CIPHER.0.cipherString: I know the disposition of women: when you will, they won't; when you won't, they set their hearts upon you of their own inclination.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: He has only half learned the art of reading who has not added to it the more refined art of skipping and skimming.
CIPHER.1.question: Solve this quote which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Melody is a form of remembrance.… It must have a quality of inevitability in our ears.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: As an actor, you want a director who makes you feel comfortable in a place that you can really create and try a lot of different things.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,11).

CIPHER.4.cipherString: Television has dried up for my generation, so it's plays and films.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword framed.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Music critics are part of the world, and I am part of the world.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword ribbon.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
CIPHER.6.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that R rails were used to encode it.
